document.full_text: police in detroit are looking for a gang of middle-aged to elderly women, dubbed the "mad hatters," who are believed to be responsible for a string of robberies, purse snatching and fraud.
document.title: detroit police hunt gang of "mad hatter" thieves
lines_and_colors: police in detroit are looking for a gang of middle-aged to elderly women, dubbed the "mad hatters," who are believed to be responsible for a string of robberies, purse snatching and fraud.
